attributes.action: Increase the 'tax free' petrol allowance from 40p per mile to at least 60p pm to bring it into line with the increase in fuel prices
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Increase the 'tax free' petrol allowance from 40p per mile to at least 60p pm to bring it into line with the increase in fuel prices."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page16601


Prime Minister's Office
